Vanilla.Name: Bandit
Vanilla.Description: He will not attack if you pay 1 gold.

Vanilla.Name: Doppelganger
Vanilla.Description: The Doppelganger always has the same total strength as its opponent including any bonuses. If you kill it you gain 1 strength

Vanilla.Name: Ghost
Vanilla.Description: Ghost materialises in (roll 1 die): 1) City 2) Village 3) Graveyard 4) Chapel 5) Castle 6) Temple

TheReaper.Name: Pack of Wolves
TheReaper.Description: Roll 1 extra die for the Wolves' attack roll and use the highest result

TheReaper.Name: Storm Caller
TheReaper.Description: If you have any Armor you lose 1 life before fighting the Storm Caller

TheReaper.Name: Miser Dragon
TheReaper.Description: If you kill the dragon roll 1 die and gain that much gold

TheReaper.Name: Goblin Trapsmith
TheReaper.Description: Roll 1 extra die for your attack roll and use the lowest result

TheReaper.Name: Ekor
TheReaper.Description: Ekor will flee if your strength is higher than 2

TheReaper.Name: Trapper
TheReaper.Description: Roll 2 dice. If the result is equal or less than your craft you may evade the Trapper. If it is higher you must fight him and you cant roll a die for your attack roll

TheReaper.Name: Hydra
TheReaper.Description: If you defeat the Hydra roll 1 die. If you roll a 1 or 2, it regenerates and the attack counts as a stand-off

TheReaper.Name: Cave Troll
TheReaper.Description: If you defeat the Cave Troll, roll 1 die. If your roll 1 or 2, it regenerate

TheReaper.Name: Stone Golem
TheReaper.Description: You can only use magical weapons during battle

TheReaper.Name: Cerberus
TheReaper.Description: Place Cerberus on the Portal of Power. Players may not cross Plains of Peril until Cerberus is dead. Cerberus cannot be evaded. You choose to attack with strength or craft

TheReaper.Name: Lord of the Pit
TheReaper.Description: If you kill Lord of the Pit you may teleport to Plain of Peril. You choose to attack with strength or craft

TheReaper.Name: Crone
TheReaper.Description: If you are defeted you do not lose 1 life. Instead you are turned into a Toad for 3 turns

TheReaper.Name: Haunt
TheReaper.Description: If you do not defeat the Haunt, you must take it as a Follower. While the Haunt is a Follower your attack rolls are reduced by 1.

TheReaper.Name: Mummy
TheReaper.Description: If you are defeated you lose 2 life instead of 1

TheReaper.Name: Succubus
TheReaper.Description: If you are defeated you lose 1 craft if able. Then place 1 craft counter on this card and add it to the Succubus craft

TheReaper.Name: Crypt Keeper
TheReaper.Description: If you defeat the Crypt Keeper, draw 5 adventure cards and take 1 object of your choise

TheReaper.Name: Black Unicorn
TheReaper.Description: If you defeat the Black Unicorn you may keep it as a Follower. It will add 1 strength and 1 craft as a Follower

TheReaper.Name: Nightmare
TheReaper.Description: The Nightmare always has the same total craft as its opponent including any bonuses.If you kill it you gain 1 craft

TheFrostmarch.Name: Cryomancer
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated you lose 2 life instead of 1 and you must miss your next turn

TheFrostmarch.Name: Eastern Dragon
TheFrostmarch.Description: You must use your lowest stat. If you are defetead you lose 1 magic object at random

TheFrostmarch.Name: Basilisk
TheFrostmarch.Description: The Basilisk rolls 2 dice for its attack and uses the highest result. If it rolls doubles, you are killed

TheFrostmarch.Name: Sky Screecher
TheFrostmarch.Description: If your attack roll is lower than your craft, you are automatically defeated

TheFrostmarch.Name: Glory Seeker
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated you discard all of your quests . If you win you may accept 1 Warlock Quest

TheFrostmarch.Name: Yeti
TheFrostmarch.Description: Before you engage you roll 1 die. If the result is equal or higher than your craft, lose 1 life

TheFrostmarch.Name: Chill Wraith
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated you must miss your next turn

TheFrostmarch.Name: Shiver Nymph
TheFrostmarch.Description: If your craft is higher than 2, the Shiver Nymph will flee

TheFrostmarch.Name: Trickster
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated you must ditch 1 object at random in addition to lose 1 life. If you win you may steal 1 object from any character in the same Region

TheFrostmarch.Name: Lich
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated place 1 life counter on this card . Instead of killing the Lich remove 1 life counter if it has one

TheFrostmarch.Name: Medusa
TheFrostmarch.Description: If you are defeated you do not lose a life. Instead you must miss 2 turns

TheDungeon.Name: Burrow Worm
TheDungeon.Description: If you are defeated you get teleported to the Dungeon Entrance

TheDungeon.Name: Giant Beetle
TheDungeon.Description: If you are defeated you lose one of your followers at random . If you have no followers you lose 1 additional life

TheDungeon.Name: Living Statue
TheDungeon.Description: If you defeat the Living Statue , the attack counts as stand-off unless you use a magic object

TheDungeon.Name: Gate Smasher
TheDungeon.Description: If you do not kill the Gate Smasher roll 1 die for each faceup Adventure Card in this Region. If you roll 1 or 2 the Adventure Card is discarded

TheDungeon.Name: Battle Hulk
TheDungeon.Description: You may evade instead of attacking

TheDungeon.Name: Soulbinder
TheDungeon.Description: You may not pay fate to reroll dice during combat

TheDungeon.Name: Vassal of Darkness
TheDungeon.Description: The Vassal of Darkness has a craft of 3 if you are evil, 6 if you are neutral and 9 if you are good. If you kill it you gain 1 craft

TheDungeon.Name: Goblin Ambusher
TheDungeon.Description: If you are defeated you will be teleported to the Dungeon Entrance in addition to losing 1 life

TheDungeon.Name: Goblin Sniper
TheDungeon.Description: Roll 1 die. If the result is higher than your craft, you cannot roll a die for your attack roll

TheDungeon.Name: Bloodroot
TheDungeon.Description: If you kill Bloodroot you may heal up to 2 lives

TheDungeon.Name: Goblin Tunneler
TheDungeon.Description: If you kill the Goblin Tunneler, on your next move you may choose to move to any Tunnel space in the Dungeon instead of taking your normal move

TheDungeon.Name: Goblin King
TheDungeon.Description: Goblin King gets +1 strength for each Goblin or Hobgoblin in all zones

TheDungeon.Name: Crawling Slime
TheDungeon.Description: Any weapons used to fight Crawling Slime is destroyed after the battle

TheDungeon.Name: Mimic
TheDungeon.Description: The Mimic always has the same total strength as its opponent including any bonuses. If you kill it you gain 1 strength

TheDungeon.Name: Vampire Bats
TheDungeon.Description: If you defeat Vampire Bats, the attack counts as a stand-off unless your attack score wins by 2 or more points

TheDungeon.Name: Spirit of Vengeance
TheDungeon.Description: If you are defeated you must take Spirit of Vengeance as a follower in addition to losing 1 life. While a follower you must attack players you land on. You can give Spirit of Vengeance to him if you win

TheDungeon.Name: Tinker Imp
TheDungeon.Description: Before you engage, one of your objects chosen at random will be teleported to a space 1 die roll clockwise

TheDungeon.Name: Blight Haunt
TheDungeon.Description: A Blight Haunt appears at (roll 1 die): 1) This space 2) Ruins 3) Dungeon Entrance 4) Cell 5) Monster Pit 6) Cursed Glade

TheDungeon.Name: Rune Dancer
TheDungeon.Description: If you kill Rune Dancer you may gain your full complement of spells

TheDungeon.Name: Tomb Warden
TheDungeon.Description: If you kill it, gain a Talisman or 3 gold instead of taking it as a trophy

TheDungeon.Name: Vampire Prince
TheDungeon.Description: IF you are defeated he will kill a random Follower in addition to losing 1 life. If you have no Followers you lose 2 life instead

TheDungeon.Name: Gate Keeper
TheDungeon.Description: If you kill the Gate Keeper you may teleport to Oasis, Village, City, Temple, Warlocks Cave, or Ruins

TheHighland.Name: Earth Elemental
TheHighland.Description: If you are defeated you will be dragged down to the Highland Entrance in addition to losing 1 life

TheHighland.Name: Roc
TheHighland.Description: If you are defeated you will be dragged to the Mountain Pass in addition to losing 1 life

TheHighland.Name: Felclaw
TheHighland.Description: You must use your lowest stat to fight Felclaw

TheHighland.Name: Amphitere
TheHighland.Description: Before you engage, if you have 1 armor you lose 1 life.

TheHighland.Name: Carrion Crows
TheHighland.Description: If you are defeated you must discard all trophies

TheHighland.Name: Mountain Dragon
TheHighland.Description: Before you engage roll 1 die. If the result is equal or higher than your craft, lose 1 life

TheHighland.Name: Skyfall Sentry
TheHighland.Description: Before you engage roll 1 die. If it is equal or higher than your craft you lose 1 life

TheHighland.Name: Tuskgore
TheHighland.Description: If you are defeated, roll 1 die and move that many spaces counter-clockwise in addition to losing 1 life

TheHighland.Name: Harpy
TheHighland.Description: If you are defeated you will be teleported to the Crags in addition to losing 1 life

TheSacredPool.Name: Ivory Sentinel
TheSacredPool.Description: The Sentinel cant be evaded. Any evil or neutral character who enters this space must end the movement and encounter this space

TheSacredPool.Name: Ebony Sentinel
TheSacredPool.Description: The Sentinel cant be evaded. Any good or neutral character who enters this space must end the movement and encounter this space

TheSacredPool.Name: Infernal Legion
TheSacredPool.Description: Evil characters may evade the Legion. Good characters cant evade the Legion

TheSacredPool.Name: Wretched
TheSacredPool.Description: You cant use fate to reroll dice during battle with the Wretched

TheSacredPool.Name: Wrathborn Warrior
TheSacredPool.Description: If the wrathborns attack roll is lower than its strength, roll 1 die and att the result to its attack score

TheSacredPool.Name: Wrathborn Knight
TheSacredPool.Description: If the Wrathborns attack roll is lower than its strength, roll 1 die and add the result to its attack score

TheSacredPool.Name: Vindicator
TheSacredPool.Description: The vindicator has 3 strength if you are good, 6 if you are neutral or a 9 if you are evil. If you kill him you gain 1 strength

TheSacredPool.Name: Firemane
TheSacredPool.Description: If you defeat Firemane you may take it as a Riding Horse instead of a trophy

TheSacredPool.Name: Shadowsoul
TheSacredPool.Description: You cant use fate to reroll dice during combat

TheSacredPool.Name: Fel Steed
TheSacredPool.Description: If you defeat the Fel Steed you may take it as a Warhorse instead of a trophy

TheSacredPool.Name: Heavenly Host
TheSacredPool.Description: Good characters may evade Heavenly Host. Evil characters cant evade

TheSacredPool.Name: Dark Fey
TheSacredPool.Description: The Dark Fey rolls 2 dice for her attack and uses the highest result. If she rolls doubles you are turned into a Toad for 3 turns

TheSacredPool.Name: Swamp Siren
TheSacredPool.Description: If you are defeated you must encounter this space again instead of moving your next turn.

TheSacredPool.Name: Wrathborn Witch
TheSacredPool.Description: If the Wrathborns roll is lower than its craft, roll 1 die and add the result to its attack score

TheSacredPool.Name: Wrathborn Acolyte
TheSacredPool.Description: If the Wrathborns roll is lower than its craft, roll 1 die and add the result to its attack score

TheCity.Name: Bravo
TheCity.Description: If you are defeated you lose 1 gold. If you win you gain 1 gold

TheCity.Name: Clockwork Cabinet
TheCity.Description: If you defeat Clockwork Cabinet you may take it as a Follower. As a Follower you can carry 4 extra objects

TheCity.Name: Clockwork Dragon
TheCity.Description: If you win you may take a Talisman instead of a trophy

TheCity.Name: City Watch
TheCity.Description: You may evade City Watch instead of attacking them. If you are defeated you do not lose life but are thrown in Jail

TheCity.Name: Fire Elemental
TheCity.Description: When revealed, discard all other cards in this place

TheCity.Name: Air Elemental
TheCity.Description: If you are defeated you are blown 1 die clockwise and immediately end your turn

TheCity.Name: Water Elemental
TheCity.Description: If you are defeated 1 of your Followers chosen of random, is blown away 1 die clockwise

TheCity.Name: Heretic Priest
TheCity.Description: If you are defeated you must roll 1 die to pray with the same result as the High Temple

TheCity.Name: Sneakthief
TheCity.Description: If you kill the Sneakthief you may discard this card and steal 1 object from another character

TheCity.Name: Night Guard
TheCity.Description: You may evade the Night Guard. If you are defeated you do not lose life but are thrown in Jail

TheNetherRealm.Name: Flesh Golem
TheNetherRealm.Description: Golems strength is equal to the number of trophy points you have, minimum 1. If you kill the Golem you gain 1 strength

TheNetherRealm.Name: Polymorph
TheNetherRealm.Description: Roll 1 die. 1-2: strength = 10, 2-3: strength = 8, 5-6: strength = 6. If you kill it you gain 1 strength

TheNetherRealm.Name: Dragon Toad
TheNetherRealm.Description: If you roll lower than the Dragons attack roll, you are turned into a Toad for 3 turns.

TheNetherRealm.Name: Blink
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may not roll a die for your attack roll

TheNetherRealm.Name: Wrathborn Wyvern
TheNetherRealm.Description: If the Wrathborns attack roll is lower than its strength, roll another die and att it to the result

TheNetherRealm.Name: Nether Blight
TheNetherRealm.Description: If your attack roll is lower than the Blights attack roll, you are killed

TheNetherRealm.Name: Crail
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may not use any objects when fighting the Crail

TheNetherRealm.Name: Mist Giant
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage roll 2 die. You must use the lowest as your attack roll and the giant uses the highest

TheNetherRealm.Name: Storm Dragon
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage, if you have any Armor or Weapon you lose 1 life

TheNetherRealm.Name: Poldhu
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may not use any spells while fighting the Poldhu

TheNetherRealm.Name: Temple Drake
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage, discard one of your followers at random. If you have none lose 1 life instead

TheNetherRealm.Name: Atlas Ogre
TheNetherRealm.Description: You add 1 attack to your roll for each fate you have

TheNetherRealm.Name: Changeling
TheNetherRealm.Description: Roll 1 die. 1-2: craft = 11, 3-4: craft = 9, 5-6: craft = 7. If you kill it gain 1 craft

TheNetherRealm.Name: Nether Golem
TheNetherRealm.Description: The Golems craft is equal to the total number of fate of all characters, minimum 1. If you kill it gain 1 craft

TheNetherRealm.Name: Sepulchre Spectre
TheNetherRealm.Description: Move all spirits from every region to this space

TheNetherRealm.Name: Nether Torment
TheNetherRealm.Description: If your attack roll is lower than the Torments, you are killed

TheNetherRealm.Name: Nether Wyrm
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage, roll 1 die. If the result is equal or lower to your fate, lose 1 life

TheNetherRealm.Name: Glimmer
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may not roll a die for your attack roll

TheNetherRealm.Name: Nether Drake
TheNetherRealm.Description: If you pay fate to reroll and roll a lower result, you are killed

TheNetherRealm.Name: Mist Dragon
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage, roll 2 dice. You use the lowest and the Dragon use the highest as attack roll

TheNetherRealm.Name: Arcane Dragon
TheNetherRealm.Description: Before you engage, if you have any spells you lose 1 life

TheNetherRealm.Name: Boukha
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may not use any followers when fighting Boukha

TheNetherRealm.Name: Titan Wraith
TheNetherRealm.Description: You may add 1 attack to your roll for each fate you have.
